name: Mark VH Jones
coverLetter:
I've been in the industry since 72.  For the past couple years I've been boucning between vinyards, wineries, Canna-consulting and helping Start-Up commercial farms from scratch.  Here is my recently posted Craigslist CV:  https://losangeles.craigslist.org/lgb/res/d/cannabis-specialist-for-hire/6364893083.html

Lasts seaspon I worked Worked for Releaf Society:  https://www.releafsociety.com/   and also for local southern Oregon farms like ShadowBox last year:  https://www.instagram.com/shadowboxfarms/  I can do up to 2 lbs of Top-Shelf trim a day, more if you dont' want it shaved.  I have reliable transpo, am dependable, punctual, team-player and all that.  Shadowbox took some snappers of my work to use as one of their Brand shots.
